name: Draw.io Diagram Generator
description: Generate and edit draw.io diagrams (.drawio XML). Use for flowcharts, architecture diagrams, swimlane diagrams in .drawio format.
author: EnhanceClaude
overview: This skill generates and edits draw.io diagrams as .drawio XML files, compatible with the VS Code draw.io extension. It covers XML structure, critical rules for fonts, z-ordering, label spacing, and special characters, along with a styles reference for shapes, edges, and colors. Ready-to-use XML templates are included for common diagram types including flowcharts, decision trees, swimlane diagrams, and architecture diagrams.
customInstructions: Requires VS Code draw.io extension for preview.
promptSuggestions: Create a draw.io flowchart showing a user registration process with decision nodes for email validation.
Generate a draw.io swimlane diagram for a ticket approval workflow with lanes for requester, manager, and IT.
Make a draw.io architecture diagram showing a three-tier web app: load balancer, app servers, and database.
Build a draw.io decision tree for a support escalation process with yes/no branches.
applications: Shareable visual documentation for non-technical stakeholders
